DOC.brief_summary: Although case report successful treatment septic shock use extracorporeal membrane oxygenation ( ECMO ) adult , study compare ECMO conventional treatment ( without ECMO ) treatment adult septic shock . Since difficult conduct randomize study allocate patient critical condition , aim conduct retrospective observational study use propensity score match analysis compare survival adult septic shock treat ECMO conventional treatment .
